name: validate_scenario
description: Validate a saved scenario for completeness and consistency. Check that all properties have required fields, global assumptions are present, and financial outputs are deterministic (same inputs produce same outputs).

expectedPropertyCount.description: Expected number of properties in scenario

checkDeterminism.description: Whether to verify loading scenario twice produces identical results

checkConstraints.description: Whether to verify business rule constraints (funding gates, no negative cash)

snapshotHash.description: Hash of previous scenario load for determinism comparison
